investing public against fraud and bad practices It finds the frauds and inside trading and sending them to corresponding analysts to deal with it Environment Agile Methodology Java 8 HTML5 CSS3 requirements of the project Involved in development of servicesbased architecture utilizing open source technologies like Hibernate ORM and Spring MVC Framework Worked extensively on Spring boot for building web services Used MAVEN in each project to automate the builds and managing project Implemented the logging mechanism using Log4j framework and used GIT version control to track and maintain the different version of the application Configured spring beans following the Spring Frameworks Dependency Injection DI and Inversion of Control IOC principles annotation based Designed and developed microservices business components using Spring Boot Built REST web microservices in the backend to handle requests sent from the frontend Angular Ajax calls Entailed in system design and development in core java using Collections multithreading Built DAO package as well as DAO IMPL package to implement the data access logic and using Hibernate Annotation to do the data mapping Developed JUnit test cases for backend logic implementation development Used Subversion SVN and GIT for version control and JIRA for tracking bugs Setup and Configured Jenkins for Continuous Integration and Deployment process Used Advanced REST Client and POSTMAN for testing JSON output using Strategic Planning System Thomson Reuters Hoboken NJ September 2017 to December 2018 Description Strategic Planning System is a financial system integrating the financial needs The Retirement Calculator is a subproject of Strategic Planning System It takes personal information current age current fund expected retirement age saving rate etc as input and it can generate charts reports and tables about the users retirement analysis The Retirement Calculator is one of important part of the companys core business and it supports companys main business Environment Agile Methodology Java 8 HTML5 CSS3 JavaScript Ajax Angular 4 Hibernate Spring XML JAXRS Spring AOP Spring security Oracle Db GIT JIRA currently being used to feed benefits to Health Connect claims and other membership systems A KP sales representative works with a company contact to create a proposal that describes a customized propertycasualty plan for the companys employees Current System is desktop application and is converted in to Web Application Environment JavaJ2EE spring Hibernate Oracle Db HTML CSS AJAX JSP Servlets Maven CSS Web Logic JUnit Eclipse Log4j SVN Responsibilities Responsible for design and implementation of various modules of the application using SpringHibernate architecture Responsible for implementing the transaction management in the application by applying Spring AOP methodology Designed and developed UI with AJAX HTML CSS and java script for more interactive web pages Involved in creating the Xml schemas and WSDL documents by understanding the business requirements and the application as web service component by using JAXWS Provided security to Web Service and created the DAO classes using Spring DAO module Created stored procedures and functions to process the data Implemented Spring ORM wiring with Hibernate provided access to Oracle RDBMS JUnit was used for unit testing and implementing Test Driven Development TDD methodology Used Eclipse IDE for developing code modules in the development environment Implemented the logging mechanism using log4j framework Used SVN version control to track and maintain the different version of the project Worked on a variety of defects to stabilize application Java Developer Education New Jersey Institute of Technology Skills
